name: Trade Wars (cronicamike)
description:
Cover the map in GREEN territories by conquering adyacent tiles via trade wars.

On a Trade War, both you and your opponent have a risk treshold defined each turn (goes from 6-26, yours is shown on the upper left corner). Your objective is to outlast your rival by playing cards to manipulate the risk treshold. As you play cards, an economic pressure index (upper center) also increases. If you lose a round and the pressure is above your risk treshold, you will take aditional damage.

Play skillfully and achieve an economic monopoly over the region!
